name: Lemon-Head Holiday Edition
description:
Lemon-Head is back with an all new game! Lemon-Head Holiday takes Lemon-Head on another adventure against his evil nemesis, Big Brain. Lemon-Head must fight new enemies in a winter themed wonderland and help save Christmas! But will he succeed? 

With a new high score system and secrets to be found, enjoy the new entry to the Lemon-Head series.

Controls:
- Move: A, W, S, D
- Attack: K
- Jump: Spacebar
- Restart: R
